verbs.description: If there [V: ’s] [ARG1: anything Singapore is known for] , it ’s law and order . The wealthy city - state of 5.5 million still uses caning as a punishment for minor crimes . The legendary security is one reason it was selected for the historic summit meeting between President Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
